detaileddescription.para:
Constructor.
open_fname
- path to the project to open on application start

Test whether application window may be closed (that is the editor may be exited).
true if application window may be closed, false in other case
Show dialog window on application start, where one may select start up action:. - Create new project - Open existing project - Open recent project
update Undo / Redo menu items. update undo / redo menu text - set names for undo / redo operations.

Save viewports parameters to BLK file.
blk
- Data Block that contains data to save (see DataBlock)

Load viewports parameters from BLK file.
blk
- Data Block that contains data to load (see DataBlock)

memberdef.name: renderInTex

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *fn, int mip_level, float _x, float _z, float tile_in_meters)
memberdef.name: saveOrthogonalScreenshot

detaileddescription.para: Editor's main window. In EditorCore based editors main window is usually derived from GenericEditorAppWindow and IEditorCoreEngine classes.
